name: DailyStoic
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Here's the translation:

---

Receive daily quotes from Stoic philosophers like Marcus Aurelius, Seneca, and Epictetus.

How does it work?
1. Activate this Skill through the Alexa App;
2. Add the Skill to your Flash Briefing;

You can then add the Flash Briefing to your Good Morning routine, for example!

More details about Flash Briefing on Alexa: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YFD82vArLf8
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
